body:
Hi Greg:

Does these errors affect running Radiance? or do you know if there is any
possible way to check problems of my build system? I once installed Radiance
3.9 using an approach from
http://www.radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2007-August/004398.html
.

Thank you.
Jia
